price: No experimentarán otra vez la muerte, salvo la que ya conocieron. Él los preservará del castigo infernal.
arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
footnotes: la que ya conocieron: En la vida mundanal.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā al-mawta illā al-mawtata al-ūlā wawaqāhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
